Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Interface RSGroupInfoManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
RSGroupInfoManagerImpl
@Private public interface RSGroupInfoManager
Interface used to manage RSGroupInfo storage. An implementation has the option to support offline mode. See RSGroupBasedLoadBalancer

    • moveServers

      Set<Address> moveServers(Set<Address> servers, String srcGroup, String dstGroup) throws IOException
      Move servers to a new group.
      Parameters:
      servers - list of servers, must be part of the same group
      srcGroup - groupName being moved from
      dstGroup - groupName being moved to
      Returns:
      Set of servers moved (May be a subset of servers).
      Throws:
      IOException

      Move servers and tables to a new group.
      Parameters:

      tables - set of tables to move

      dstGroup - groupName being moved to

      RSGroupInfo determineRSGroupInfoForTable(TableName tableName) throws IOException
      Determine RSGroupInfo for the given table.
      Parameters:
      tableName - table name
      Returns:
      RSGroupInfo which table should belong to
      Throws:
      IOException

    • updateRSGroupConfig

      void updateRSGroupConfig(String groupName, Map<String,String> configuration) throws IOException
      Update RSGroup configuration
      Parameters:
      groupName - the group name
      configuration - new configuration of the group name to be set
      Throws:
      IOException - if a remote or network exception occurs
